snippet.title: SM64 Beta Recreation Trailer (The Preservation Project)
snippet.description:
I’m proud to announce one of the latest projects I’m involved in— “The Preservation Project”. The goal of this project is to recreate the Shoshinkai Demo of Super Mario 64 faithfully, and accurately.

This trailer was featured in Kaze’s F3.

The Preservation Project Discord: https://discord.com/invite/tpp
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Marionova64
